params._settingsData: Encoded settings to apply to the fee for a fund

params._comptrollerProxy: The ComptrollerProxy contract for the fund

payout(address,address).details: Returns false by default, can be overridden by fee

params._comptrollerProxy: The ComptrollerProxy contract for the fund

params._settlementData: Encoded args to use in calculating the settlement

returns.settles_: True if the fee settles on the _hook
returns.usesGav_: True if the fee uses GAV during settle() for the _hook

update(address,address,uint8,bytes,uint2.details: Unimplemented by default, can be overridden by fee

updatesOnHook(uint8).details: Returns false values by default, can be overridden by fee

returns.updates_: True if the fee updates on the _hook
returns.usesGav_: True if the fee uses GAV during update() for the _hook

activateForFund(address,address).notice: Allows Fee to run logic during fund activation

addFundSettings(address,bytes).notice: Add the initial fee settings for a fund

getInKindRateForFund(address).notice: Gets the fee rate for an in-kind redemption

getRecipientForFund(address).notice: Gets the recipient of the fee for a given fund

getSpecificAssetsRateForFund(address).notice: Gets the fee rate for a specific assets redemption

payout(address,address).notice: Runs payout logic for a fee that utilizes shares outstanding as its settlement type

setRecipientForFund(address,address).notice: Sets the fee recipient for the given fund

settlesOnHook(uint8).notice: Gets whether the fee settles and requires GAV on a particular hook

update(address,address,uint8,bytes,uint2.notice: Update fee state after all settlement has occurred during a given fee hook

updatesOnHook(uint8).notice: Gets whether the fee updates and requires GAV on a particular hook
